reviews.customers_say: Customers love the dress's appearance, with one noting it's a beautiful non-itchy sequin pink dress, and they find it comfortable and not at all itchy. Moreover, the dress receives positive feedback for its fit, with one customer mentioning the top portion is perfectly fitted to their curves, and its versatility for different occasions like birthdays and New Year's. However, opinions are mixed regarding size and length, with some finding it too big and too short. Additionally, the sequin quality receives mixed reviews - while some say they don't shed, others report them falling off. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and doesn't look cheap
items.body: This dress is really cute and fits perfectly. I'm 5' 2" and a 40 F bust and purchased an XL. The top portion was perfectly fitted to my curves and the bottom half was loose and flowy. It sparkled nicely without being too much and the sequins are really small, making it 1) comfortable when sitting 2) less ostentatious and 3) less apt to catch on other things. It also has a thin black lining so you don't need to wear a slip and the fabric has some stretchiness to it. The interesting thing is you can't tell which is the front or back as there is no label and it has the same amount of fabric on either side of the dress. There are no zippers, you just slip it over your head and go. It's lightweight and has a slight flowing to it. It was very pretty and I'm very happy with this purchase. Read more
items.author: Christine H.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my Cecilia Monsters Inc costume!
items.body: I bought this dress for my Cecilia (Mike Wazowski’s girlfriend) costume from Monsters Inc., and it was absolutely perfect! The sparkly fabric really caught the light and looked amazing in photos. The fit was super comfortable, loose and flowy, but still flattering. I added a few accessories to complete the look, and I got so many compliments all night! Definitely recommend this dress if you’re looking for something fun, shiny, and party-ready. Read more
items.author: One-Click Picks

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's an ok dress. But I returned it
items.body: Nice color- a bit too blousy and loose. I know the style is lose fitting but I think bc it's a heavier material with the sequins, that it just lays heavily if that makes sense. No swing Read more
items.author: Karen ramirez

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and festive dress!
items.body: Very cute and comfy dress. I got a small and the straps are way too long so I did have to sew them to shorten them up. Otherwise it would have hung down to my belly button... But it's very cute now that I fixed it! I also washed it in the washing machine in a mesh bag on delicate and laid it flat to dry. Washed great! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s sparkly without being heavy
items.body: Such a fun dress! The sequins are sparkly and eye-catching, and the fit is comfy and flowy. Read more
items.author: Marry

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not recommend.
items.body: For the price, I expected more. This dress is cheaply made, runs big, and does not lay flat at neck and back lines. Literally some fabric quickly sewn together. Neckline is not a V, it is more of a scoop cut, on both front and back (there is no front or back). Disappointing and do not recommend. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars The Gold is not what it looks like in the picture
items.body: The dress itself is adorable, but the gold color is more of a rose gold and not a true gold like the picture. I need a true gold dress, so it is going back. Read more
items.author: Angela Davis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect birthday dress!
items.body: Such a cute dress. Fit to size, sling dress. Lining makes for no itching! Perfect dress for a celebration! Read more
items.author: Julie Johnson

short_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress V Neck Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gold, Gray, Black (With Multicolor), Gold(with Multicolor), Black, Black(with Silver), Red, Rose Red, Silver, Pink, Silver(with Gold), Purple, Black(with Gold Blue), Yellow(with Gold). If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
